overview: Andrew S. Wyatt founded Cornerstone Capital Management in 1993 with the goal of providing clients the rare combination of superior investment returns and world class client service. Today he serves as Chairman of the Cornerstone Investment Policy Committee and is also responsible for the company’s client service, compliance and communications efforts. Prior to Cornerstone, Andy was Vice President and Portfolio Manager at Investment Advisers Inc. At IAI, he gained extensive investment experience working with both institutional and individual clients in the management of their financial portfolios. He graduated from the University of Minnesota with a Bachelor of Science degree in Agricultural Economics with a concentration in Futures Trading. His vision, passion and energy results in an unwavering commitment to helping clients achieve their financial objectives by creating a high performance culture that attracts and rewards the best financial management talent in the industry.
